questions.question: how to make more friends
questions.answer:
If you are looking to make more friends, one approach could be to actively participate in online platforms and social networks. By joining relevant online platforms, forums, and discussion groups related to your interests, you can engage in discussions, share your knowledge, and learn from others. This can help you expand your social circle and connect with like-minded individuals.

If you want to learn more about this topic, you can visit this link: https://moodle.hm.edu/course/view.php?id=20194#coursecontentcollapse3

What steps have you already taken to meet new people and make friends?
